comments:
Using M5

When editing the Import-Packages and clicking the Properties button, the following exception is thrown when entering 1.0.0 in the "Minimum version" field, choosing "Exclusive" and clicking OK.  This is probably new to the "Maximum version" field being empty.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-04-01 22:48:51.176
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-04-01 22:48:51.186
!MESSAGE invalid format
!STACK 0

Janek, is this still a problem in M6?

Yes, this was still a problem - marking as fixed.
I addressed another issue alongside this fix release - package objects were't returning correct versions when they had version ranges.
